params.requestId: Redemption request ID SECURITY FIX: Since shares are now burned at request time, cancellation must re-mint shares back to the user.

checkCircuitBreaker().details: Can be called by anyone - allows external monitoring to trigger

returns.triggered: True if circuit breaker was triggered

returns.shortfall: Amount of shortfall (0 if adequately collateralized)

params.threshold_: Collateral ratio threshold in basis points (e.g., 9500 = 95%)

returns.currentRatio: Current collateral ratio in basis points
returns.triggered: Whether circuit breaker is currently triggered
returns.triggeredAt: Timestamp when triggered (0 if not triggered)

returns.excess: Amount of excess collateral (0 if undercollateralized)

returns.readyIds: Array of request IDs that are ready

returns.isReady: True if can be processed now

returns.totalValue: Total value of all pending redemptions (in shares)

returns.collateralValue: Total collateral value in USD (18 decimals)
returns.isDepositsEnabled: True if deposits are not paused
returns.isRedemptionsEnabled: True if redemptions are not paused

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns.requestId: Redemption request ID SECURITY FIX: Shares are now burned at request time to prevent manipulation via NAV changes between request and processing. The ssUSD amount stored in the request is the value at request time, and the shares burned are tracked separately for accurate accounting.

resetCircuitBreaker().details: Should only be called after collateral ratio is restored

params.delay_: New delay in seconds (must be between MIN_REDEMPTION_DELAY and MAX_REDEMPTION_DELAY)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

MAX_REDEMPTION_DELAY().notice: Maximum redemption delay (7 days) - usability ceiling

MIN_REDEMPTION_DELAY().notice: Minimum redemption delay (15 minutes) - security floor

batchGetCollateralBalances(address[]).notice: Get collateral balances for multiple tokens

batchIsOperator(address[]).notice: Check operator authorization for multiple addresses

checkCircuitBreaker().notice: Check collateral ratio and trigger circuit breaker if below threshold

circuitBreakerThreshold().notice: Minimum collateral ratio before circuit breaker triggers (basis points, 10000 = 100%)

circuitBreakerTriggered().notice: Whether circuit breaker has been triggered

circuitBreakerTriggeredAt().notice: Timestamp when circuit breaker was triggered

getCollateralBalance(address).notice: Get collateral balance for a token

getReadyRedemptions(uint256).notice: Get redemptions ready to be processed

getRedemptionStatus(uint256).notice: Get redemption request status with timing details

getUserPendingRedemptionCount(address).notice: Get count of pending redemptions for a user

redemptionShares(uint256).notice: Shares locked for pending redemptions (burned at request time for accurate accounting) Maps requestId => shares that were burned

requestRedemption(uint256,address).notice: Request redemption of ssUSD for collateral

resetCircuitBreaker().notice: Reset circuit breaker (owner only, after fixing collateral)

totalCollateralValue().notice: Total collateral value in USD (18 decimals)

totalPendingRedemptionShares().notice: Total shares pending redemption (for NAV calculations)
